paper.title: Advantages of credit scoring models in loan applicants evaluation
paper.abstract: Credit risk evaluation is an important problem in financial analysis domain. Many statistical classification methods have been suggested in the literature to solve this problem. Several techniques like discriminant analysis, logistics regression, neural networks etc. have been used for credit rating. In this article advantages for banks of using credit scoring models are described.

domain_result.justification: 该论文讨论了信用评分模型在贷款申请人评估中的优势，这直接涉及信用风险的管理，属于金融风险管理的范畴。
